meanings.definition: Of or relating to a galaxy.
meanings.sent1: The telescope captured a galactic image of distant stars.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the galactic structure of the Milky Way.
meanings.sent3: The aliens traveled in their galactic spaceship to explore new worlds.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared to galactic heights as she dreamed of space travel.
meanings.sent5: The galactic beauty of the night sky left everyone in awe.

meanings.sent1: The football stadium was a galactic space compared to their tiny backyard.
meanings.sent2: The task ahead seemed galactic in scale and complexity.
meanings.sent3: The amount of food at the buffet was galactic, and he didn't know where to start.
meanings.sent4: Her appetite was galactic after a long day of hiking.
meanings.sent5: The mountain range stretched out in a galactic panorama before them.
